wikipedia_page.main: Donna Mansell (; 1983–2010) is a double heart transplant recipient who has inspired a campaign for Organ Donation education  as well as counselling others in a similar situation from her hospital bed. Donna also promoted organ donation through media and charity events and was also the figurehead for the British Heart Foundation's Christmas fundraising drive. Donna's Campaign has been continued by her husband Aaran Mansell after her unfortunate death in July 2010.
